meanings.sent1: The automatic door opened touchless as I approached.
meanings.sent2: The faucet turned on touchless when I waved my hand under it.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the card float touchless in the air.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to fill the room touchless, enveloping us all.
meanings.sent5: The breeze moved the leaves touchless, creating a peaceful rustling sound.

meanings.sent1: The touchless payment system allowed for quick transactions.
meanings.sent2: The touchless soap dispenser was convenient in the restroom.
meanings.sent3: The touchless car wash was like magic for my vehicle.
meanings.sent4: Her touchless control over the situation impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The touchless technology made life easier for many people.
